label: AB3_hP24_185_c_ab2c-001
title: Na$_{3}$As Structure
comments:
(Hafner, 1994) state that this is a correction of the $D0_{18}$ Na$_{3}$As structure, but see the discussion about \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B_hP24_185_ab2c_c-001}{Cu$_{3}$P} and other similar compounds. 
 Space group $P6_{3}cm$ \#185 allows an arbitary choice of the origin of the $z$-axis.  Here we set $z_{3} = 1/4$ for the arsenic (6c) atoms.
